content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: glass_bottle
inventory=[{"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 4, "index": 16}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 4, "index": 17}, {"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 25, "index": 20}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_log", "quantity": 35, "index": 28}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 4, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 38}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft a glass_bottle, I first need to craft 3 glasses. I can do this by smelting 1 red_sand at slot 34 into slot 11.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 34 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: glass_bottle
inventory=[{"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 4, "index": 16}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 4, "index": 17}, {"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 25, "index": 20}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_log", "quantity": 35, "index": 28}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 4, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 2, "index": 34}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 38}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}]
thought: Since there is still more red_sand available, I can smelt another piece to make a second glass.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 34 to slot 12 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: glass_bottle
inventory=[{"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 4, "index": 16}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 4, "index": 17}, {"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 25, "index": 20}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_log", "quantity": 35, "index": 28}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 4, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 38}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}]
thought: Since there is still more red_sand available, I can smelt another piece to make a third glass.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 34 to slot 13 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: glass_bottle
inventory=[{"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 4, "index": 16}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 4, "index": 17}, {"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 25, "index": 20}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_log", "quantity": 35, "index": 28}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 4, "index": 33}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 38}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that I have three glasses, I can start crafting the glass_bottles. The recipe requires placing a glass in the top left corner, so I will move the glass at slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: glass_bottle
inventory=[{"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 4, "index": 16}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 4, "index": 17}, {"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 25, "index": 20}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_log", "quantity": 35, "index": 28}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 4, "index": 33}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 38}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}]
thought: The next step in the recipe is to place a glass in the top right corner, so I will move the glass at slot 12 to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: glass_bottle
inventory=[{"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 4, "index": 16}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 4, "index": 17}, {"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 25, "index": 20}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_log", "quantity": 35, "index": 28}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 4, "index": 33}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 38}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}]
thought: The next step in the recipe is to place a glass in the bottom center, so I will move the glass at slot 13 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: glass_bottle
inventory=[{"type": "glass_bottle", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 4, "index": 16}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 4, "index": 17}, {"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 25, "index": 20}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_log", "quantity": 35, "index": 28}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 4, "index": 33}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 38}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that the glass_bottles have been crafted, I can move them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
